sentences.sContent: Take any popular song and compare it to any aria by the Italian opera composer Vincenzo Bellini (1801-1835), for example.
sentences.sContent_eng: Take any popular song and compare it to any aria by the Italian opera composer Vincenzo Bellini (1801-1835), for example.
sentences.sCn: 让我们来看看流行歌曲和意大利歌剧作曲家文森佐·贝里尼（1801-1835）的咏叹调之间的区别吧。

sentences.sContent: I hope my poem is about loss, not nostalgia, that the tenor singing an Italian aria, like the ruined pilasters of the theater, suggests an historical dimension of loss.
sentences.sContent_eng: I hope my poem is about loss, not nostalgia, that the tenor singing an Italian aria, like the ruined pilasters of the theater, suggests an historical dimension of loss.
sentences.sCn: 我希望我的诗表现的是失落，而非乡愁，如同那名男高音唱着意大利咏叹调，宛如剧院的断壁颓垣，都流露出历史的失落。

trans.tranCn: 独唱曲, 咏叹调, 唱腔
trans.tranOther: a song that is sung by only one person in an  opera  or  oratorio
